title: Megaloi Theoi (sanctuary, Imbros)
description: A sanctuary of the "Great Gods" on the Aegean island of Imbros/Gökçeada. The remains of the sanctuary are located southwest of modern Kaleköy, to the west of the airport in the vicinity of a ruined monastery of Agios Konstantinos at a place formerly known as Roxado.

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth using referenced works.
properties.title: Imagery Location of H. Konstaninos / Roxado ruins
